text: Eleonora Camilla Gasparrini (born 21 July 1995) is an Italian professional track and road racing cyclist, who since 2021 rides with the UCI Women's Continental Team Valcarâ€“Travel & Service. As a junior, Gasparrini became European Champion at the 2020 European Road Championships in the junior road race. At elite level, in the Women's World Tour, she had a podium finish in the 2021 Ronde van Drenthe. Gasparrini rode in the 2022 Tour de France Femmes. As a track cyclist, she became European Champion (under-23) in the team pursuit event at the 2021 UEC European Track Championships (under-23 & junior) and 2022 UEC European Track Championships (under-23 & junior). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Italian cyclists Category:Sportswomen
title: Eleonora Gasparrini
